bibl.title: Hellenistic Royal Barges.
The Ptolemies, the Sea and the Nile. Studies in Waterborne Power.

bibl.note: Considers royal ships both as symbols of regal wealth and power and in their development over time, with utility giving way to appearance.
bibl.seg: Dorothy J. Thompson, Hellenistic Royal Barges.
Kostas Buraselis, Mary Stefanou & Dorothy J. Thompson (edd.), The Ptolemies, the Sea and the Nile. Studies in Waterborne Power (Cambridge, 2013) pp. 185-196, 1 fig.
Considers royal ships both as symbols of regal wealth and power and in their development over time, with utility giving way to appearance.
